text: Vernon Lapham (born 31 August 1971) is a Zimbabwean windsurfer. He competed in the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Zimbabwean male sailors (sport) Category:Zimbabwean windsurfers Category:Sailors at the 1988 Summer Olympics – Division II Category:Olympic sailors of Zimbabwe
title: Vernon Lapham
